content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Bo Li

content: Mister Heine, thank you for the opportunity to discuss the rental price of the apartment. Could you please provide me with your initial offer?
name: Bo Li

content: My initial offer is 800 Euros per month. Thank you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Thank you for your initial offer, Mister Heine. Based on my research and the size of the apartment, I would be willing to consider an offer of 750 Euros per month.
name: Bo Li

content:
That's very reasonable, I can accept that price.

Mister Heine, can you tell me how long the lease will be?

Also, is there a security deposit required? If yes, how much?

Thank you.

Mister Heine, I would like to clarify that the monthly rental price of 750 Euros is final and I am willing to sign the lease immediately.

I would also like to know if there are any penalties for early termination of the lease.

Thank you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Thank you for accepting my offer, Mister Heine. The lease will be for a period of one year, with a possibility of renewal for another year. A security deposit of one month's rent (75 Euros) will be required upon signing the lease agreement.

As for penalties for early termination of the lease, there will be no additional charges if you decide to move out before the end of the lease term. However, you will need to provide 30 days' notice to the landlord.

Please let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
name: Bo Li
